question: 歯医者
sourceMnemonic: You know that a <ja>医者</ja> is a doctor. So what is a <kanji>tooth</kanji> doctor? A <vocabulary>dentist</vocabulary>. Seriously, don't forget to floss. <ja>歯医者</ja> hate when you forget to floss.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
